name: Dragon Racing
description:
R: Restart
F: Fullscreen
Z: Accelerate
X: Decelerate
C: Side Step
Z+X: Drift
Shift: Trick

Bottom Right Meter: How much energy you have
Top Right Meter: How much overcharge you have
Bottom Left Meter:  What speed you're moving at
Top Left Meter: How much your trick is charged

Energy: Determines how fast you move in the air. It is used when flying and recharges on the ground
Overcharge: Extra energy gained by doing tricks
Trick: Hold the trick button to charge the meter, then let go when it turns red to gain overcharge. If you let go when it is green or let it fully charge, no overcharge with be gained. The higher the meter, the more charge will be gained. You can chain three tricks together, gaining more boost with each successive chain.
